mapper.sql: Id, ProjectName, TypeId, Description, Amount, FenShu, LeadMinFenShu, PreheatMaxFenShu, UnitPrice, ProvinceCode, CityCode, AreaCode, Address, ProjectImage, AuditStatus, ProjectStatus, IsShelve, MemberId, PreheatTime, StartTime, EndTime, Schedule, InvestmentNumber, FollowNumber, AuditName, AuditTime, CreateName, CreateTime,Refusereasion,RedidueFenshu,RediduePreheatMaxFenShu
mapper.select: select * from project where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (ProjectStatus=2 OR ProjectStatus=3) AND IsShelve=1 AND AuditStatus=2 AND NOW()>PreheatTime AND EndTime>NOW()
mapper.insert:
select @@IDENTITY as id
insert into project (ProjectName, TypeId, Description, Amount, FenShu, LeadMinFenShu, PreheatMaxFenShu, UnitPrice, ProvinceCode, CityCode, AreaCode, Address, ProjectImage, MemberId, PreheatTime, StartTime, EndTime, CreateName) values (#{projectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{fenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leadminfenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preheatmaxfenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{provincecode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{citycode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areacode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preheattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update project
ProjectName = #{projectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TypeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
FenShu = #{fenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LeadMinFenShu = #{leadminfenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PreheatMaxFenShu = #{preheatmaxfenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UnitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=REAL},
ProvinceCode = #{provincecode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AreaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ProjectImage = #{projectimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AuditStatus = #{auditstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ProjectStatus = #{projectstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IsShelve = #{isshelve,jdbcType=BIT},
MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PreheatTime = #{preheattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Schedule = #{schedule,jdbcType=INTEGER},
InvestmentNumber = #{investmentnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FollowNumber = #{follownumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AuditName = #{auditname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AuditTime = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Refusereasion = #{refusereasion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RedidueFenshu = #{redidueFenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RediduePreheatMaxFenShu = #{rediduePreheatMaxFenShu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update project set ProjectName = #{projectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TypeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, FenShu = #{fenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LeadMinFenShu = #{leadminfenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PreheatMaxFenShu = #{preheatmaxfenshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UnitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=REAL}, ProvinceCode = #{provincecode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AreaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProjectImage = #{projectimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AuditStatus = #{auditstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ProjectStatus = #{projectstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, IsShelve = #{isshelve,jdbcType=BIT}, MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PreheatTime = #{preheattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Schedule = #{schedule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, InvestmentNumber = #{investmentnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FollowNumber = #{follownumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AuditName = #{auditname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AuditTime = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
{call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' Id desc ', ' a.* ', ' project as a ', '
', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )}

{call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' p.ProjectStatus ASC ,p.EndTime ASC ', ' p.Id, p.ProjectName, p.TypeId, p.Amount, p.FenShu, p.UnitPrice, p.ProjectImage, p.Schedule, p.ProjectStatus, p.StartTime, IFNULL((SELECT p2.Value FROM projectstrategy p2 WHERE p2.ProjectId = p.Id AND p2.isdel=0 AND p2.Key = ''SteadyA''), ''0'') AS AValue, IFNULL((SELECT p2.Value FROM projectstrategy p2 WHERE p2.ProjectId = p.Id AND p2.isdel=0 AND p2.Key = ''SteadyB''), ''0'') AS BValue', ' project p ', '
', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
mapper.update:
update project set AuditStatus = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PreheatTime = #{onlinePreheatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, StartTime = #{openFinancingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endFinancingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RefuseReasion=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AuditName = #{auditName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AuditTime = now() where Id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT p.Id, p.ProjectName, p.TypeId, p.Amount, p.FenShu, p.UnitPrice, p.ProjectImage, p.Schedule, p.ProjectStatus, p.StartTime, IFNULL((SELECT p2.Value FROM projectstrategy p2 WHERE p2.ProjectId = p.Id AND p2.isdel=0 AND p2.Key = 'SteadyA'), '0') AS AValue, IFNULL((SELECT p2.Value FROM projectstrategy p2 WHERE p2.ProjectId = p.Id AND p2.isdel=0 AND p2.Key = 'SteadyB'), '0') AS BValue FROM project p WHERE p.IsShelve = 1 AND p.ProjectStatus != 1 AND p.ProjectStatus != 5 AND p.ProjectStatus != 4 AND p.IsNovice=1 AND p.AuditStatus = 2 AND NOW() >= p.PreheatTime AND p.EndTime >= NOW()

SELECT p.Id, p.ProjectName, p.TypeId, p.Amount, p.FenShu, p.UnitPrice, p.ProjectImage, p.Schedule, p.ProjectStatus, p.StartTime, p.Address, p.Description, p.FollowNumber, p.FenShu, p.RedidueFenshu, IFNULL((SELECT p2.Value FROM projectstrategy p2 WHERE p2.ProjectId = p.Id AND p2.isdel=0 AND p2.Key = 'SteadyA'), '0') AS AValue, IFNULL((SELECT p2.Value FROM projectstrategy p2 WHERE p2.ProjectId = p.Id AND p2.isdel=0 AND p2.Key = 'SteadyB'), '0') AS BValue ,p1.Name AS CityName ,p2.Name AS ProvinceName FROM project p LEFT JOIN publicprovincecity p1 ON p1.Code=p.CityCode LEFT JOIN publicprovincecity p2 ON p2.Code=p.ProvinceCode WHERE p.Id=#{projectid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: UPDATE project set isShelve=#{isShelve,jdbcType=BIT} WHERE Id=#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE ProjectStatus when 2 then 1 else 0 END) yr, SUM(CASE ProjectStatus when 3 then 1 else 0 END) rzz, SUM(CASE ProjectStatus when 4 then 1 else 0 END) rzsuccess, SUM(CASE ProjectStatus when 4 then Amount else 0 END) rzsucamount, SUM(CASE ProjectStatus when 5 then 1 else 0 END) rzfail, (SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM member) usercount, (SELECT SUM(case Level WHEN 2 then 1 ELSE 0 end ) FROM member) investor, (SELECT SUM(case TypeId WHEN 3 then Amount ELSE 0 END) from balancerecord) recharge, (SELECT SUM(case TypeId WHEN 4 then Amount ELSE 0 END) from balancerecord) cash FROM project
